players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
You: "Charlie was killed, so he wasn’t the mafia. I suspect Bob is the mafioso."
Bob: "Alice, it’s odd you accuse me. Maybe you’re lying. I suspect you might be the real killer."
Diana: "I investigated Bob, and he is mafia. Bob, you know I'm detective and yet you stayed silent. Vote him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
